title: Phase 1: Command registry data structure
description:
## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create `command` struct: Name, Summary, Usage, Run func()
- [ ] Build `[]command` or `map[string]command` for all 18 commands
- [ ] Replace `main()` switch with registry lookup
- [ ] Verify existing behavior preserved (`go test ./...`)

## Context
Part of: Global --help Support for All Commands
Depends on: None (first phase)
